name: Verify that Error is shown when user enters negative numbers in the Less than ROAS field

steps.name: Given I open a browser and open RBAC Login page
When I click on sign in RBAC link
Then I enter the username and password to RBAC as tlsapp
Given Click on Create a rule
When Input a number in the less than ROAS field
Then Check whether the ROAS error is shown or not

fullName: UI test cases: Verify that Error is shown when user enters negative numbers in the Less than ROAS field
